name: HaliO2
description:
NOTE: Make sure everyone is using the same version.

Game is in really early Development.  There will be BUGS!  Changes to the game will happen sudden and without warning.

OBJECTIVE:

Steal other teams flag and protect yours and score the most team points

HOW TO PLAY:

When you start, you will end up in the Lobby.  If you enter in the text box below Create a Game and click create, you will create a game on the Unity Service. 

If you click Play and Host, you will host a game locally.  You will need to add Port 7777 to your firewall / Port Forward and tell everyone your public IP.

When in the Game lobby, you will need to select a team.  Clicking the colored box will select a team.  Blue is Loot Goblin team, red is Hali Team, and Black is not in a team. Selecting Join will tell everyone you are ready.  Once everyone clicks join, the match will start.

NOTE: The game has an issue restarting a game after a round has been played.  Please restart the host and the client before beginning a new game. I'll have this fixed at some point.

KEYS:

W A S D is for movement

Middle Mouse selects between Build and Shooting mode

Mouse scroll cycles items to build when in build mode

Left mouse click builds in build mode and shoots in shooting mode

TAB Opens Leader Board

HAZARDS:

Team killing

Players hiding in placed bushes

Wire Fence slows you down

Mines take health

Walls Prevent you from passing (Walls can be damaged)
